components.name: Streamlit Application
components.description: The frontend application built using Streamlit that interacts with users and displays the UI for authentication.

components.name: Authentication Controller
components.description: Handles user authentication logic, including login, registration, and session management.

components.name: Cookie Management
components.description: Manages cookies for session persistence and re-authentication, ensuring secure storage of user session data.

components.name: OAuth2 Services
components.description: Integrates with external OAuth2 providers (e.g., Google, Microsoft) for user authentication.

components.name: Configuration File
components.description: Stores user credentials and application settings in a YAML format, including hashed passwords and OAuth2 parameters.

data_flows.description: User credentials are sent from the Streamlit application to the Authentication Controller for verification.
Upon successful authentication, session cookies are created and managed by the Cookie Management component.
Requests for OAuth2 authentication are forwarded to the respective external services.
The Authentication Controller reads user credentials and settings from the configuration file.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary where user credentials and session data are processed and stored.

trust_boundaries.name: External Authentication Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary for interactions with external OAuth2 services for user authentication.
